About Us Home.about-description-1: CV. Sinar Baja Electric (SBE) was established in 1981 and is now the largest local loudspeaker manufacturer in Southeast Asia. With
About Us Home.about-description-1-2: certification, SBE focuses on high-quality products. ACR Speaker is one of CV. Sinar Baja Electric's flagship products.
About Us Home.about-description-2: ACR Speaker consists of tweeter speakers to subwoofers that have various sizes of voice coils that can be matched according to user needs. The ferrite and neodymium magnets are selected to be the strongest and of the best quality. ACR Speaker also provides speakers from single magnets to double magnets that are suitable for use by the Indonesian people.

About Us Page.about-us-title-heading: High-Quality Speakers Made from the Finest Materials
About Us Page.about-us-desc-1: ACR Speaker was established in 1994 and is one of the largest professional speaker driver brands in Indonesia. ACR offers several product categories, including: Fabulous, Excellent, Premier, Deluxe, and Hi-Fi products. Each type has its own distinctive color and design. These products are manufactured through a rigorous process that meets international standards, ensuring long-term use for every user.
About Us Page.about-us-desc-2: With the ACR tagline, Moving Ahead To The Future Of Sound, we continuously innovate each product by keeping up with technological advancements and the demands of the times. Providing a memorable audio experience for every Indonesian is one of our main goals. We believe that by maintaining quality, the audio world will continue to evolve for the better.
About Us Page.about-us-desc-3: In addition to offering quality products, ACR Speaker also provides speaker repair services available at the CV. Sinar Baja Electric factory in Surabaya. The purpose of this service is to restore speakers to like-new condition, going through the same quality control process as when first purchased. For customers who prefer to repair their speakers themselves, the factory also supplies voice coils and recone kits, which can be purchased at the nearest authorized dealer.
